author: Stereogum
title: Grammys 2017: Watch Metallica Perform With Lady Gaga
text: Metallica performed "Moth Into Flame" with Lady Gaga at the Grammys tonight, and it was a kind of a shit show! James Hetfield's mic didn't work for the first half of the performance, Gaga tripped at one point, the camera work was shaky and borderline unwatchable, and it ended with Hetfield throwing his guitar and … More »
